channel.title: Lord of the Rings Online
channel.description: Anyone planning on playing this when it comes out? I'm trying to get into the beta, and if I do I'll let you all know little bugs I find out.

item.title: Lord of the Rings Online
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:9, topic:65773”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=95639.msg1027197#msg1027197 date=1174290129]

omg they would never send my email to verify my acount… anyways it alright sorta like w0w but better and free unlike w0w its less costly and much the same and alot of peepz can play it

Free beta right now, but just wait. It’ll be a minimum of 15 dollars a month to play when it comes out.
[/quote]

Actually, its $9.99 a month or 199 lifetime. (if you pre-order)

but it will probably go up once it comes out.[/quote]

Well not too bad I guess. I heard on the mmoprg.com forums that it was at least 15 dollars a month. Then again this was like, at least a year ago.

Read full topic

item.title: Lord of the Rings Online

Lastd3adp3rson:

omg they would never send my email to verify my acount… anyways it alright sorta like w0w but better and free unlike w0w its less costly and much the same and alot of peepz can play it

Free beta right now, but just wait. It’ll be a minimum of 15 dollars a month to play when it comes out.

Anyways, I could say the same thing about WoW that they stole everything from other games and ideas. Almost all games are just modified versions of other ideas that worked well.

item.title: Lord of the Rings Online
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

I have about 5 beta accounts

Its okay, but I couldn’t stop saying “wow, Blizzard should sue”. Way too close to world of warcraft, and I didnt find it all that grabbing. There were a few nice classes and skills to chose from though, that is a plus

Read full topic

item.description:
@Max_Is_No1 wrote:

I was on the stress test. Really fun & addictive (like WoW)! I already have a preorder. Can’t wait till’ the 30th of March so i can play beta.
